test_plan.name: Navigation System Testing
test_plan.description: Test the responsive navigation bar and mobile menu functionality

test_cases.name: Desktop Navigation Display
test_cases.description: Verify navigation bar displays correctly on desktop with all menu items
steps: Verify navigation bar is visible at the top
Check all menu items are displayed (Home, About, Services, Portfolio, Packages, Testimonials, Contact)
test_cases.expected_result: Navigation bar displays all menu items and logo correctly on desktop

test_cases.name: Mobile Navigation Menu
test_cases.description: Test mobile hamburger menu functionality
steps: Verify hamburger menu icon is visible
Click hamburger menu to open mobile navigation
Verify all menu items are accessible in mobile menu
Click outside menu to close it
test_cases.expected_result: Mobile menu opens/closes correctly and displays all navigation items

test_cases.name: Navigation Links Functionality
test_cases.description: Test that all navigation links work correctly
steps: Verify page navigates to About section
Verify page navigates to Services section
Verify page navigates to Portfolio section
Verify page navigates to Packages section
Verify page navigates to Testimonials section
Verify page navigates to Contact section
test_cases.expected_result: All navigation links successfully navigate to their respective pages

test_plan.name: Hero Section Testing
test_plan.description: Test the main hero section with animations and call-to-action buttons

test_cases.name: Hero Section Display
test_cases.description: Verify hero section displays correctly with all elements
steps: Check that main heading is displayed
Check that background effects are working
test_cases.expected_result: Hero section displays all elements correctly with proper styling

test_cases.name: Hero Animations
test_cases.description: Test hero section animations and effects
steps: Observe initial animation of hero content
Check for smooth transitions and effects
Verify shader animations are working properly
test_cases.expected_result: Hero section animations play smoothly without errors

test_cases.name: Call-to-Action Buttons
test_cases.description: Test CTA buttons functionality
steps: Locate 'View Portfolio' button in hero section
Verify it navigates to Portfolio page
Locate 'Get Quote' or similar CTA button
Verify it navigates to Contact page
test_cases.expected_result: CTA buttons navigate to correct pages when clicked

test_plan.name: Portfolio Gallery Testing
test_plan.description: Test the circular gallery and portfolio showcase functionality

test_cases.name: Circular Gallery Display
test_cases.description: Test the circular gallery component displays correctly
steps: Check that images are displayed in circular format
Verify text labels are shown for each image
test_cases.expected_result: Circular gallery displays all images with proper labels

test_cases.name: Gallery Interactions
test_cases.description: Test gallery scrolling and hover effects
steps: Check that smooth scrolling animations work
test_cases.expected_result: Gallery interactions work smoothly with proper hover effects

test_cases.name: Portfolio Page Gallery
test_cases.description: Test portfolio page with filtering and lightbox
steps: Click on filter tabs to change content
Verify lightbox/modal opens with image details
test_cases.expected_result: Portfolio page filtering and lightbox functionality work correctly

test_plan.name: Services Page Testing
test_plan.description: Test the services showcase and service cards

test_cases.name: Services Page Display
test_cases.description: Verify services page displays all service categories
steps: Check that all service categories are displayed
Verify service cards are properly formatted
Check that icons and descriptions are visible
test_cases.expected_result: Services page displays all service categories with proper formatting

test_cases.name: Service Card Interactions
test_cases.description: Test service card hover effects and interactions
steps: Check that card animations are smooth
Test clicking on service cards if they have links
test_cases.expected_result: Service cards have proper hover effects and interactions

test_plan.name: Packages Page Testing
test_plan.description: Test the pricing packages and booking functionality

test_cases.name: Package Display
test_cases.description: Verify all pricing packages are displayed correctly
steps: Verify all package tiers are displayed (Bronze, Silver, Gold)
Check that pricing information is visible
Check that 'Book Now' buttons are present
test_cases.expected_result: All package tiers display with correct pricing and features

test_cases.name: Package Selection
test_cases.description: Test package selection and booking flow
steps: Click on 'Book Now' button for any package
Verify it navigates to contact/booking form
Check that package information is pre-filled or referenced
test_cases.expected_result: Package booking flow works correctly

test_cases.name: Testimonials Display
test_cases.description: Verify testimonials are displayed correctly
steps: Check that client names and reviews are visible
Check that testimonials are properly formatted
test_cases.expected_result: Testimonials display with proper formatting and content

test_cases.name: Testimonials Animations
test_cases.description: Test testimonials carousel and animations
steps: Check for smooth transitions between testimonials
test_cases.expected_result: Testimonials animations work smoothly

test_plan.name: Contact Form Testing
test_plan.description: Test contact form functionality and validation

test_cases.name: Contact Form Display
test_cases.description: Verify contact form displays all required fields
steps: Check that all required fields are present (name, email, phone, message)
Check that submit button is present
test_cases.expected_result: Contact form displays all required fields with proper styling

test_cases.name: Form Validation
test_cases.description: Test form validation for required fields
steps: Try to submit form with empty fields
test_cases.expected_result: Form validation works correctly for all fields

test_cases.name: Form Submission
test_cases.description: Test form submission functionality
steps: Fill in all required fields with valid data
Verify form data is processed correctly
test_cases.expected_result: Form submission works correctly with proper feedback

test_plan.name: Responsive Design Testing
test_plan.description: Test website responsiveness across different screen sizes

test_cases.name: Mobile Responsiveness
test_cases.description: Test website on mobile devices
steps: Resize browser to mobile viewport (375px width)
Verify all content is visible and properly formatted
Check that navigation menu works on mobile
Verify images and text are properly sized
Test scrolling and interactions on mobile
test_cases.expected_result: Website displays correctly on mobile devices

test_cases.name: Tablet Responsiveness
test_cases.description: Test website on tablet devices
steps: Resize browser to tablet viewport (768px width)
Check that all components are properly sized
Verify gallery and portfolio display correctly
test_cases.expected_result: Website displays correctly on tablet devices

test_cases.name: Desktop Responsiveness
test_cases.description: Test website on desktop devices
steps: Resize browser to desktop viewport (1200px+ width)
Check that all animations work properly
Verify gallery and portfolio display with full features
test_cases.expected_result: Website displays correctly on desktop devices

test_plan.name: Animations and Effects Testing
test_plan.description: Test all animations, transitions, and visual effects

test_cases.name: Page Transitions
test_cases.description: Test smooth page transitions
steps: Verify no layout shifts during transitions
test_cases.expected_result: Page transitions are smooth and professional

test_cases.name: Scroll Animations
test_cases.description: Test scroll-triggered animations
steps: Check that elements animate into view
Verify animations are smooth and not jarring
test_cases.expected_result: Scroll animations work smoothly and enhance user experience

test_cases.name: Interactive Effects
test_cases.description: Test interactive hover effects and button animations
steps: Check that hover effects work properly
Click buttons and verify click animations
test_cases.expected_result: Interactive effects enhance user experience without being distracting

test_plan.name: Performance Testing
test_plan.description: Test website performance and loading times

test_cases.name: Page Load Speed
test_cases.description: Test initial page load performance
test_cases.expected_result: Page loads quickly with optimized performance

test_cases.name: Image Optimization
test_cases.description: Test image loading and optimization
steps: Check that images are properly optimized
test_cases.expected_result: Images are optimized and load efficiently
